author: Staff Reporter
text: A 24-year-old youth was arrested and about 1,000 pirated DVDs of latest Tamil movies were seized in Palyamkottai on Saturday. Acting on a tipoff, a team of police led by Assistant Commissioner Madhavan Nair conducted the raid. Investigation revealed that the arrested youth, S. Nambiraj of Tirunelveli Town, had been posing himself as a journalist.
title: Youth held; DVDs seized
